Subject: Pacifix Arrives

--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix, after driving for a while, arrives at the the entrance. He 
hears noise, and transforms quickly, and enters the hole. When he 
gets to the bottom, and views the carnage below. "STOP," he yells 
into the battle, as he comes out of the entrance in barricade mode, 
prepared to defend.

Crossroads leaps up, and starts running towards the small battle, 
his mind having already decided that the Autobots have military 
tactical advantage in numbers and skill over the apparent enemies. 
He notes that the smoke grenade will be a nuisance. His photon 
cannons hum and two photon blasts head to one of the bots 
(Brandings).

Swoop follows Crossroads. he transforms into Pterodactyl mode, 
and heads towards the enemy bots. He launches four A-G missiles 
at a different bot (Arty). "Swoop will help Grimlock!" he yells to 
Grimlock.
